Question: This person also runs his own record label GOOD Music, home to artists such as John Legend, Mos Def and Big Sean.
Hints: In 2004, this person had his first of a number of incidents involving music award events.
1 "Hottest MC in the Game." On December 17, 2010, this person was voted as the MTV Man of the Year by MTV.
This person has since returned to voice the character in two additional episodes.
